data.tooltip: Use mushroom skills to reach checkpoints.

Gather supplies for the Astral Ward before time runs out.
Collect ancient Sunspear weapons and return them to the rebels before time runs out!
Gain Wolverine's Favor by besting him in Combat. You will be revived if you get knocked out during the fight.
Collect the documents without being detected.

Eat yellow mushrooms to score points and blue mushrooms to gain abilities that help you in your hunt. Beware of the poisonous mushrooms with green spores, and use your burrow ability to bypass closed gates!
Jump and glide to collect bugs before time runs out!

Perform a fireworks show for the Hullgardeners. Using different colors back to back increases the enjoyment of the show and gives more approval points!
Free as much Kryptis essence as you can. Each bit of essence freed restores your mount's energy, allowing you to fly longer without landing.

Complete the course as quickly as possible!
Run Around for No Reason.
Gather supplies and avoid tendrils before time runs out!
Jump, launch, and glide your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!
Prove your expertise with the griffons of Sandswept Isles.

Kill as many chak as you can before the timer runs out, but be careful—your scrap rifle is prone to overheating! Destroying chak eggs will release a goo that will heal you and cool your rifle if you are close by, but it's likely to stir up the chak.
Gather documents for [[Order of Shadows]] agents before time runs out!
Shoot as many target dummies as you can before time runs out!
Work as a team to destroy as many targets as you can before time runs out!
Work as a team to destroy as many targets as you can before time runs out!
Work as a team to destroy as many targets as you can before time runs out!
Collect the mysterious energy as quickly as possible!

Race to the finish and destroy as many nets as you can within the time limit.

Destroy nets by dashing through them or by using your skimmer's Water Jets skill (requires [[Convergent Evolution]] Mastery). Use both options together to get the highest score!

Restore Water Jets ammo by flying through checkpoints and magic orbs.
Gather supplies for the ranch hands of Skimmer Ranch quickly!

Race to the finish and destroy as many target as you can within the time limit.

Destroy targets by dashing through them or by using your skyscale's Fireball skill (requires Fireball Mastery). Use both options together to get the highest score!

Restore Fireball ammo by flying through checkpoints and power-ups.
